collection.heading: Data Collection:
collection.text: This portfolio does not collect personal data. The only information stored is your language preference in browser's local storage.

legal.heading: Legal Basis:
legal.text: Processing under GDPR Article 6(1)(f) - legitimate interest (necessary for website functionality).

rights.heading: Your Rights:
rights.text: Under GDPR, you may: request access to your data, request data deletion, contact us via email

managing.heading: Managing Cookies:
managing.text: You can delete cookies in your browser settings:
browsers: Chrome: Settings → Privacy → Clear browsing data
